snippet.title: F.E.A.R. 3  - GamesCom 2010: Cinematic Trailer | HD
snippet.description:
It's time for the brothers, like no others, to come out and play in this new cinematic from the GamesCom 2010.

PRE-ORDER NOW! F.E.A.R. 3 - http://www.amazon.de/gp/product/B003ULY73M?ie=UTF8&tag=xboxviewtv-21&linkCode=as2&camp=1638&creative=6742&creativeASIN=B003ULY73M

F.E.A.R. 3  - GamesCom 2010: Cinematic Trailer | HD
Developer: Day 1 Studios
Release: April, 2011
Genre: First-Person, Shooter
Platform: PC, Xbox 360, PS3
Publisher: Warner Bros. Interactive Entertainment
Website: http://www.whatisfear.com/
